title: Nebos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, All Raw
description: A 95% vegan/100% raw food cuisine restaurant serving salads, desserts, sandwiches, dehydrated raw food products based on dried and fresh fruits and soaked and sprouted nuts and seeds. The only non-vegan item is honey. Beverages include smoothies, juices, spring water, organic coffee, and tea ceremony. Its interior consists of two dining rooms: one suitable for business and meetings, the other designed to escape from fuss into a world of peace and calm. Ionized air. Previously at Bessarabska Square, TC Metrograd.
